data.title: Family of Henry (Hotspur) Percy & Lady Elizabeth Mortimer
meta_keywords: family of Henry (Hotspur) Percy & Lady Elizabeth Mortimer
data.meta_description: Family of Henry (Hotspur) Percy & Lady Elizabeth Mortimer.
data.text:
Henry (Hotspur) Percy

Henry, known as Hotspur, was born on May 20th, 1364 in Alnwick, Northumberland, England.1 He died due to Battle of Shrewsbury at the age of 39 on July 21st, 1403 in Shrewsbury, Shropshire, England.1

Lady Elizabeth Mortimer

Elizabeth was born on February 12th, 1370 in Usk, Monmouthshire, England.1 She died at the age of 47 on April 20th, 1417 in England.1

Elizabeth Percy

Elizabeth was born in 1390.2 She died at the age of 47 on October 26th, 1437.3

Henry Percy

Henry was born on February 3rd, 1393.1 He died due to battle of St. Albans at the age of 62 on May 22nd, 1455 in St. Albans.1
